subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy again scorched the course, building an eight-shot lead with a round of 68 to sit at 14 under par heading into the final round.
snippet: Rory McIlroy again scorched the course, building an eight-shot lead with a round of 68 to sit at 14 under par heading into the final round.
